description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNET-41573	Referencing XObjects for multiple times
PDFNET-41880	Add a row containing some text at the end of page if table is broken in two pages
PDFNET-41881	Set different TabLeaderType for different TOC Level

Enhancements
PDFNET-41767	Multiple reference to same image
PDFNEWNET-40023	Adding text inside a shape
PDFNEWNET-40707	Add text inside Rectangle object

Bugs
PDFNET-41892	Alignment of radio button text and checkbox text is not proper
PDFNET-41735	doc.Pages[1].Resources.Images.Names and doc.Pages[1].Resources.Images[0].Name returns different names for same image.
PDFNET-41848	Jumbling words when converting Pdf to Html with UseZOrder = true
PDFNET-42032	Pdf file is not compilant with PDF/A-1a format (transparency and missing objects)
PDFNET-42031	Pdf file is not compilant with PDF/A-1a format (transparency)
PDFNEWNET-38235	PDF to HTML - Links are converted into plain text
PDFNEWNET-39140	PDF to HTML- Text Selection flickers
PDFNEWNET-40684	PDF to HTML - Missing characters and invalid format of resultant file
PDFNEWNET-40683	PDF to HTML - Missing characters and invalid format of resultant file
PDFNET-41589	Load single image instance for multiple times
PDFNET-41506	Stamp text alignment issue
PDFNET-41891	When PDF is converted to DOCX, the text formatting changes.
PDFNEWNET-36321	XFA form conversion failure
PDFNET-41809	PDF to PDF/A - Formatting issues in resultant file
PDFNET-41717	PDF to PDFA: transparent background is being rendered as black
PDFNEWNET-39398	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not correct
PDFNET-41899	PDF to PPTX - Text on first page is absent
PDFNET-41404	HTML/PDF to PPTX conversion issue
PDFNET-41654	HTML to PPTX: Missing white Text form HTML to PPTX
PDFNET-41906	Text position of TextFragment
PDFNET-41992	PDF to PDFA: compliance fails (soft mask in image)
PDFNEWNET-40717	PDF to JPEG - Some characters rendered wrongly
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
